overview: Teitur left the Faroe Islands as an ambitious teenager who wanted to find a better place to make music. After a long and successful music career abroad, Teitur returns back to his home country populated by only 50,000 inhabitants. His goal is to create an album with local musicians, many of them amateurs. In his search for the style for the album, he realises that he has been longing for the simple things in the culture and traditions of the islands.
title: Teitur – Storymusic
